alert.note: Alert for Dunklin (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 02 at 9:33PM CST until February 04 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST THURSDAY NIGHT... ...ICE STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation. Additional sleet and snow accumulations of up to two inches and ice accumulations of one tenth to three tenths of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Dunklin County. * WHEN...Until midnight CST Thursday night. * IMPACTS...Power outages and tree damage are likely due to the ice. Travel could be nearly impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep extra blankets, food, water and a flashlight in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
